author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of #37440

#### PR description:

Update of L1T menu in TSG GTs (tag name: [`L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_0_0_xml`](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/tags/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_0_0_xml)) [[link to L1T request]](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/run-3-gt-update-of-the-l1-menu-tag-v1-0-0-in-run-3-mc-gts-and-run-3-data-relvals-gts/8895).

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

#37440

Development of HLT menus for Run-3 startup.
title: Update of L1T menu in TSG GTs to `L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_0_0_xml` [`12_3_X`]
